name: The Rock Is Hot
description:
The Rock Is Hot is a platformer game where you control a rolling rock. When the rock gets hot, it moves faster, and if it gets too hot, it explodes. The flames and the hot ground make the rock warmer, so  in most cases it's a good idea to try to avoid them.

Bug found: Only the first half of the game works sadly, if you want to play the full game click here: https://gamejolt.com/games/the-rock-is-hot/
